curriculum.name: Early Math Review
curriculum.description: Early math practice in 8 areas: counting, addition and subtraction intro, place value (tens and hundreds), addition and subtraction within 20, addition and subtraction within 100, addition and subtraction within 1000, measurement and data, and geometry.

task.title: Find 1 more or 1 less than a number
Comparing numbers on the number line
Making small numbers in different ways
Add and subtract: pieces of fruit
Greater than and less than symbols
Adding within 20 using place value blocks
Subtract within 20 using a number line
Subtract within 20 using place value blocks
Missing numbers in addition and subtraction
Find missing number (add and subtract within 20)
Addition and subtraction word problems: superheroes
Addition and subtraction word problems: gorillas
Add and subtract within 20 word problems
Understanding place value when adding tens
Understanding place value when adding ones
Adding by making a group of 10
Adding 53+17 by making a group of 10
Adding by making a group of 10
Addition and subtraction with number lines
Add within 100 using a number line
Subtract within 100 using a number line
Add within 100 using place value blocks
Subtract within 100 using place value blocks
Adding and subtracting on number line word problems
Adding two digit numbers on a number line
Add and subtract on the number line word problems
Missing numbers in addition and subtraction
Find the missing number (add and subtract within 100)
Add within 1,000 using place value blocks
Subtract within 1,000 using place value blocks
Adding and subtracting on number line
Adding up to four 2-digit numbers word problems
Getting a sense of meters and centimeters
Getting a sense of inches and feet
Making picture graphs and line plots
Making picture graphs and line plots
Telling time on a number line
Tell time to hour or half hour
Identify the value of US coins and dollars
Equal parts of circles and rectangles
